alert.note: Alert for Niobrara Valley, Fort Niobrara NWR, Samuel R McKelvie National Forest (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 10 at 2:37PM CDT until October 11 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM CDT TUESDAY FOR LOW HUMIDITY AND GUSTY WINDS FOR THE NIOBRARA VALLEY... The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and humidity, which is in effect from noon to 8 PM CDT Tuesday. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 208 Niobrara Valley/Fort Niobrara NWR/Samuel R McKelvie National Forest. * TIMING...Tuesday afternoon through early evening. * WINDS...Northwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 20 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Highs in the upper 70s to lower 80s. * LIGHTNING...Not anticipated. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly and be very difficult to control.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Niobrara Valley, Fort Niobrara NWR, Samuel R McKelvie National Forest
